nodes.bodyText: Is EventRoute under the impl package? If yes, then it will need to be moved out of it and into /models -> the pipeline will complain that impl classes shouldn't be referenced in public APIs
nodes.diffHunk:

                 objectPagedResponse.getValue().getContinuationToken(),
                 objectPagedResponse.getDeserializedHeaders()));
     }
+

nodes.bodyText: nit: this can be inline in line 1324, right?
This function and the next page function are called in two places, so I'd rather keep them in their own function
q - should "twin" be in lower case? We've referenced it as "digital twin" everywhere.
There is some strange spacing in the comments.
